description:
THE OUTER LIMITS (1963) 02 

2. The Hundred Days of the Dragon   9/23/1963
"An oriental power" develops a radical medical advance that temporarily makes skin malleable. They then manage to replace a Presidential candidate with one of their own.

Writer: Robert Mintz, Allan Balter
Director: Byron Haskin
Guest star: Vic Perrin (Schumacher (uncredited)) , Aki Aleong (Su Lin), Joan Camden (Ann Pearson), James Yagi (Li Kwan), Clarence Lung (Ho Chi Wong), Henry Scott (Special Agent Marshall), Eugene Chan (Hotel Oriental (uncredited)), Richard Gittings (Briggs (uncredited)), Leslie Stevens (I) (Election Announcer (uncredited)), Robert Brubaker (Byron (uncredited)), James Hong (Wen Lee), Bert Remsen (Frank Sommers), Richard Loo (Li Chin-Sung), Sidney Blackmer (William Lyons Selby), Phillip Pine (Theodore Pearson), Mark Roberts (Robert Carter), Nancy Rennick (Carol Conner)
